name: Tattoo Removal Clinic
description: In collaboration with the S.F. Department of Public Health, CARECEN SF’s Tattoo Removal Clinic offers a free community-based laser tattoo removal clinic in San Francisco. Second chance offers comprehensive services and enrichment activities to youth ages 13-25 years of age
fullDescription: In collaboration with the S.F. Department of Public Health, CARECEN SF’s Tattoo Removal Clinic offers a free community-based laser tattoo removal clinic in San Francisco. Second chance offers comprehensive services and enrichment activities to youth ages 13-25 years of age
whatTheyOffer: In collaboration with the S.F. Department of Public Health, CARECEN SF’s Tattoo Removal Clinic offers a free community-based laser tattoo removal clinic in San Francisco. Second chance offers comprehensive services and enrichment activities to youth ages 13-25 years of age
howToGetIt: Young people between the ages of 13–25 years-old with visible tattoos and a San Francisco address qualify. Call to make an appointment for a consultation. They will ask you to fill out an application and attend a mandatory orientation. Tattoos that are visible, violence-related, have ex-boyfriend/ex-girlfriend names, or show anything that poses a threat to your safety are eligible for removal.
address: 3101 Mission Street, Suite 101,  San Francisco, CA, 94110
